title: Title
where_with_dog: Where to Go with a Dog
hero_description: Have you ever wondered where you can go with your dog without worry? We're here to make it easier for you! Where to Go with a Dog is a platform born out of love for pets and a desire to let everyone enjoy their company – whether in a restaurant, café, or hotel.
intro: We want to introduce you to the Where to Go with a Dog website
description: The website allows pet owners to easily search for places where they can go with their pets.
choose_place: Where would you like to go?
spots_error404: Unfortunately, there is no pet-friendly place found for your search
small_puppies: Small dogs and puppies of larger breeds up to 5 months old
site_info: Welcome to Where to Go with a Dog – your favorite platform that makes traveling and going out with your pets easier! Inspired by the daily challenges of pet owners, we decided to create a solution that allows everyone to enjoy the company of their pets, without the stress of whether a particular place is pet-friendly. Our mission is simple – to allow pet owners to quickly and easily find restaurants, cafés, hotels, and other places that are open to dogs and other pets. We believe pets deserve to be part of our adventures, and Where to Go with a Dog is here to make every step easier for you.
free_use_description: Using our platform is completely free, both for users and for owners of hospitality establishments. Adding new places to the site is simple and free – we want our community to grow, and that all animal lovers have access to the latest information. Where to Go with a Dog is a place where love for pets connects people and places that offer a friendly environment for four-legged friends.
how_to_suggest: How to suggest a hospitality place?
how_to_suggest_description: By clicking the 'Add a pet-friendly location' button, a simple form (modal) will open where you can enter the necessary details about the place. After that, the information will be reviewed and published on the site.
important_to_know_description: All information on the site comes from user experiences. Please keep in mind that the pet policies of hospitality establishments may change. Before visiting, it's always a good idea to double-check the information directly with the place.
suggest_instructions: Clicking the 'Suggest' button opens the data entry form.
note: Data comes from personal experience, changes in place categories may occur.
rule_1: The dog must be under constant supervision by the owner.
rule_2: Owners are responsible for any damage caused by their dog.
rule_3: Aggressive dogs must leave the park.
rule_4: Dogs must be healthy, chipped, and vaccinated.
rule_6: Do not bring food other than for dogs, glass, or dangerous items.
rule_7: The dog must be on a leash when entering and leaving.
rule_8: Children under 8 years old are not allowed.
rule_9: Do not leave the dog unattended.
rule_10: Pregnant, sick, and injured dogs are not allowed.
rule_11: The park is for visitors who follow the rules.
rule_12: Do not bring unvaccinated puppies under 4 months old.
rule_13: Pick up your dog’s waste and other trash.
hero_title: Where to Go with a Dog? - A place where your pets are welcome!
free_add: Freely add new places and help the community
pet_welcome: Always know where your pet is welcome!
random_spot_description: Where to Go with a Dog platform is your ultimate resource for discovering pet destinations. Whether you're looking for the perfect park or pet-friendly places, we connect you to spots that welcome your furry friends. Our platform offers detailed reviews, interactive maps, and a vibrant community hub where pet lovers can exchange tips and heartwarming stories. Plan your next adventure with confidence, knowing that you and your pet are always welcome!
contact_description: Do you have a technical issue? Want to send feedback? Need details about our business plan? Let us know.
subject: Subject
